item.title: Coretek's cloud migration methodology
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tj3F0tX8eyc 6:26 - 5 steps Assess> Assess # Cloud Economic Assessment (8:20)> Cloud Economic Assessment (8:20) # understand resources needed on-premise (mem, storage, bandwidth) Plan> Plan # use cloud adoption framework (10:45) Migrate> Migrate # Cloud Migration Strategies (4:30)> Cloud Migration Strategies (4:30) # Rehost - create vm on cloud and move application to it
